mapper.select: SELECT LICENSE_SEQ AS licenseSeq, EMP_NO AS empNo, ACQ_DAY AS acqDay, LICENSE_TYPE AS licenseType, LICENSE_NO licenseNo, ISSUE FROM HM_LICENSE_INFO where emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HM_LICENSE_INFO ( LICENSE_SEQ , EMP_NO , ACQ_DAY , LICENSE_TYPE, LICENSE_NO , ISSUE ) VALUES ( LICENSE_SEQ.nextval, #{empNo}, #{acqDay}, #{licenseType}, #{licenseNo}, #{issue} )
mapper.update: update HM_LICENSE_INFO set ACQ_DAY =#{acqDay}, LICENSE_TYPE =#{licenseType}, LICENSE_NO =#{licenseNo}, ISSUE =#{issue} where LICENSE_SEQ =#{licenseSeq} and EMP_NO =#{empNo}
mapper.delete: delete from HM_LICENSE_INFO where LICENSE_SEQ =#{licenseSeq} and EMP_NO =#{empNo}
